page.title: 19THE MEDIA
page.content: {Hucknall}is served by one weekly newspaper, the{Hucknall Dispatch}which comes out on Friday. In addition there is the{Nottingham Evening Post}which is daily and carries a local supplement each Tuesday.There are two 'free' papers - the{Recorder}and the {Nottingham}Trader.The major stories in the{Dispatch}recently have concerned the incinerator plant and the teachers pay dispute.The newspaper carries a lively letters page and covers all local sporting activities.Other major stories covered recently have included the County Council elections and court cases. The area is also served by two local{radio}stations{-BBC Radio {Nottingham}and{Radio Trent.}Both include news items on{Hucknall.The former carries interviews on local issues whilst{Radio Trent}is a commercial station with record request
